node.detail_zh: 患者為癌症病人，入住伊利沙伯醫院內科病房。與第 #1513 及 #1563 宗個未患者曾於同時段入住同一病格，為同一內科病房內第三名確診患者。7 月 13 日開始發燒。
node.detail_en: The patient is a cancer patient and was admitted to the medical ward of Queen Elizabeth Hospital. She was staying in the same ward as patients #1513 and #1563 and is the third patient in the ward to be diagnosed. She started having fever on July 13.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

node.location_en: Kwai Tung House, Tung Tau Estate (II)
